cast.name: 凯文·伊斯特曼 Kevin Eastman

this_title: Turtle Power The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
trans_title: 神龟力量：忍者神龟简明史
introduction: In the spring of 1984, a strange new comic book sat beside cash registers in select shops, too big to fit in the racks, and too weird to ignore. Eastman and Laird's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles presented a completely original breed of super hero. It was too bizarre, too crazy. It broke all the rules and should never have worked. Until it sold out. Again and again and again. For...
chinese_title: 神龟力量：忍者神龟简明史
foreign_title: Turtle Power The Definitive History of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
